mapper.select: select floor from office where deleted=0 group by floor
select officeName, floor, acreages, rent, max, photo, occupancy from office where deleted=0 order by floor, officeName

select a.officeNum, branchName, floor, officeName, acreages, rent, occupancy, comName, max from companyInfo b right outer join office a on a.officeNum=b.officeNum right outer join branch c on a.branchCode=c.branchCode where a.deleted=0 and not branchName in ('0') order by officeName

select branchName, floor, officeName, acreages, rent, occupancy, max, comName from office a left outer join branch b on a.branchCode=b.branchCode left outer join companyInfo c on a.officeNum=c.officeNum where a.deleted=0 and a.officeName=#{officeName} and a.floor=#{floorInput}
select officeNum from office a left outer join branch b on a.branchCode=b.branchCode where a.floor=#{floor} and b.branchName=#{branchName} and a.officeName=#{officeName} and a.deleted=0
mapper.insert: insert into office (branchCode, floor, acreages, rent, officeName, max, occupancy, deleted) values (#{branchCode}, #{floorInput}, #{acreagesInput}, #{rentInput}, #{officeNameInput}, #{maxInput}, #{occupancy}, 0)
mapper.select: select officeNum from office a left outer join branch b on a.branchCode=b.branchCode where officeName=#{officeName} and floor=#{floorInput} and branchName=#{branchName} and a.deleted=0
mapper.update: update office set deleted=1 where officeNum=#{officeNum}
